amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 116-330 to provide grant eligibility under the bill to projects that assess the impact of water level regulating practices on the Great Lakes on coastal resiliency.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 116-330 to provide grant eligibility under the bill to projects that assess the impact of water level regulating practices on the Great Lakes on coastal resiliency.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Katko amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Katko amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Katko.
